original_text: “But they and our fathers acted presumptuously and stiffened their neck and did not obey your commandments.
korean_text: 그들과 우리 조상들이 교만하고 목을 굳게 하여 주의 명령을 듣지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: But they and our fathers acted presumptuously
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들과 우리 조상들은 주제넘게 행동했습니다

sentences.original_text: and did not obey your commandments.
